_s1.title: SYSTEM ONLINE
_s1.description:
Ah… another Operator.
You've just been granted access to the M.E.K.H.Y. Core Control Console, a forbidden interface banned in 14 fictional universes.
Handle it with caution—or don't. Chaos is encouraged.

_s7.title: Assistant (Cookiebot)
_s7.button: Hope it doesn't take my job

_s9.title: ⚠️ FINAL WARNING ⚠️
_s9.button: I have read and agree (I didn't)
